title: Time Series Forecasting
description: Many Business activities are seasonal in nature, where most of the business are dependent on a particular time of festival and holidays. Every business uses sales promotion techniques to increase the demand for their products and services, in order to stay in the market for a longer period. In this article, I am going to do sales forecasting with machine learning by analyzing the historical data with techniques like Time Series Forecasting.
description_lemmatized: many business activity seasonal nature business dependent particular time festival holiday every business us sale promotion technique increase demand product service order stay market longer period article going sale forecasting machine learning analyzing historical data technique like time series forecasting
